description: Exact Riemann problem initial conditions and reference parameters from Toro (2009), Chapter 4, Table 4.1. Solutions are computed analytically via the exact Riemann solver.
reference: Toro, E.F. (2009). Riemann Solvers and Numerical Methods for Fluid Dynamics, 3rd ed., Springer. DOI: 10.1007/b79761

test1.name: Sod shock tube
test1.description: Classic Sod (1978) problem. Produces right-moving shock, contact, and left-moving rarefaction.

test2.name: 123 problem (two rarefactions)
test2.description: Symmetric expansion producing near-vacuum. Tests solver robustness near vacuum.

test3.name: Left Woodward & Colella blast
test3.description: Strong shock and contact. Tests resolution of strong discontinuities.

test4.name: Collision of two shocks
test4.description: Two strong shocks collide. Tests correct shock speed computation.

test5.name: Stationary contact
test5.description: Nearly stationary contact with large pressure ratio. Tests contact resolution and entropy fix.
